lines.text: Are you just what's happening to me? Or are you what's happening to everyone?

Well, you are a curious little munchkin. Well, if you must know, I'm your 'now'. I mean at least now I'm your now. Other nows I'm other people's nows. Did you get all of that? I mean, I'm just happening everywhere, honey. I'm so now that, well, if there were such a thing as reincarnation I'd come back as Bloomingdale's.
